lake.name		name of each lake (standardized across all files)
time			date of measurement in YYYY-MM-DD format
ShortWave			Downwelling shortwave radiation in W/m^2
LongWave			Downwelling longwave radiation in W/m^2
AirTemp			Air temperature in deg C
RelHum			Relative humidity in % saturation
WindSpeed			Wind speed in m/s
Rain			Precipitation in mm/day
Snow			Snowfall in mm/day (directly converted from precip when air temp < 0 degC)
